item.title: 'More relevant every day' in the U.S.: A filmmaker documented Russia's journalists
item.description: Julia Loktev's documentary My Undesirable Friends follows young independent journalists covering Putin's invasion of Ukraine.

item.title: Measles continues to spread in the US, but with some letup
item.description: As South Carolina's outbreak grows to 876 confirmed cases, vaccinations in the state surged in January. Cases have also been reported in two ICE deten...

item.title: Homan to draw down agents in Minnesota. And, U.S.-Russia nuclear arms deal expires
item.description: U.S. border czar Tom Homan says 700 federal agents will be leaving Minnesota. And, the New START Treaty between the U.S. and Russia expired today.

item.title: The Winter Olympics get 8 new events, including the first new sport in decades
item.description: Ski mountaineering will make its Olympic debut this year, the first winter sport to do so since 2002. Skeleton, luge, ski jumping and moguls are also ...

item.title: Team USA settles in to athletes' villages, 'smash' pizzas
